name: August 2022
title: August 2022
body:
Original Confluence URL: https://qbdocs.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/IAM/pages/3723034625 - please cross-check the quality of the ZD article with the Confluence counterpart and remove this line before publishing the ZD article

Table of Contents

    • Configurable API token rate limits
      • Salesforce REST OAuth
        • Custom Administrator Roles
          • Bulk assign users to groups
          • Okta Admin Console Groups page enhancements
          • Advanced search for users and groups
          • Trusted Origins for iFrame embedding
          • Okta Sign-in Widget, version 6.6
          • Okta AD agent, version 3.12.0
          • Okta RADIUS Server agent, version 2.17.5
          • Okta On-Prem MFA agent, version 1.5.1
          • Event hooks for log streaming
          • Self-service registration deprecation
          • Rate Limits dashboard includes API Token data
          • System Log events for Report CSV actions
          • System Log update for app sign-on policy
          • System Log update for telephony operations
          • System Log events for customer support
          • Microsoft Azure Join documentation
          • Customization name change
          • AD Agent auto-updates only when operational
          • OIN Manager enhancements
          • Dynamic issuer mode for identity providers
          • Clock skew requirement removed
          • Configurable API token rate limits is GA in Production
          • Rate Limits dashboard includes API Token data

See: https://help.okta.com/en-us/Content/Topics/ReleaseNotes/archive/oce-relnotes-2022.htm

Feature

Remark

Configurable API token rate limits

irrelevant (but nice to have in case of an incident)

Salesforce REST OAuth

not in use

Custom Administrator Roles

nice to have, no adaption needed

Bulk assign users to groups

very nice to to have, currently no adaption needed

Okta Admin Console Groups page enhancements

irrelevant

Advanced search for users and groups

irrelevant

Trusted Origins for iFrame embedding

nice to have, no adaption needed for now

Okta Sign-in Widget, version 6.6

no update needed, take changes into account when updating

Okta AD agent, version 3.12.0

not in use

Okta RADIUS Server agent, version 2.17.5

not in use

Okta On-Prem MFA agent, version 1.5.1

not in use

Event hooks for log streaming

irrelevant

Self-service registration deprecation

irrelevant

Rate Limits dashboard includes API Token data

nice to have, no adaption needed

System Log events for Report CSV actions

System Log update for app sign-on policy

System Log update for telephony operations

nice to have, no adaption needed

System Log events for customer support

nice to have, should usually not occur

Microsoft Azure Join documentation

not in use

Customization name change

irrelevant

AD Agent auto-updates only when operational

not in use

OIN Manager enhancements

not in use

Dynamic issuer mode for identity providers

should not interfere with our used feature set, be aware of this when configuring

Clock skew requirement removed

nice to have

API

PKCE improvements

use PKCE for future use cases

Configurable API token rate limits is GA in Production

not change needed, but if there is time left we should set that

Rate Limits dashboard includes API Token data

nice to have for investigating
